snippet.title: Eternal Remnant: The First Chapter | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
➡️Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1946380/Eternal_Remnant_The_First_Chapter/
➡️ itch.io: https://arcfinder-studios.itch.io/eternal-remnant
Eternal Remnant: The First Chapter is a story-driven adventure RPG inspired by retro classics.

Follow the unforgettable tale of Vera and her little brother Arin, in an epic journey that will see them fight for their lives to reach the city of Sunspire – their only hope of salvation as they are hunted down for an unspeakable secret they carry.
